extendedInfo.description: The Itâs A Family Affair application includes three main featuresthat will get you on your way to having a great family reunion.The application facilitates your duties as the head of the familyand provides various tools to keep the family connected, onschedule and within budget.Event Feature:Setup event information, including the name, date, time andaddress of the family reunion, along with a family picture.Plan Feature:Utilize various milestones to accomplish a successful familyreunion. Create polls for voting and commenting on differentideas for the reunion, such as food, games, music, etc.Family Feature:Identify family members that have joined in on the planningprocess, and invite family who have not. Maintain an accurateaccount of RSVPs.

reviews.title: Looked good but...
reviews.comment: I have tried and tried to get this app to work (it won\'t let me create an account). I have uninstalled and reinstalled it three times but this did not help. This app appeared to be something I could use to plan my family reunion...guess I have to look for something else!!! I gave it a one but wasn\'t even sure if I should rate it especially since I could not get it to work. Please fix what ever is wrong I would like to try it again!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible App
reviews.comment: No functionality at all. Cannot add items to the plan, interface with family, or share so the committee can see it. A post it note is better. Epic fail!
reviews.author: A Google User
